name: Hiroshi Fushida
introduction: Hiroshi Fushida ( ) is a former Japanese racing driver, who made his debut in the Maki Engineering team, making him the first Japanese driver to enter a Formula One grand prix, but he failed to qualify for both. He was the son of a large kimono manufacturer in Tokyo, and has previously participated in the 1972 Fuji Grand Champion series, Formula A and Trans-Am.
